Affect Province with Anonymous Event:Wrath of Pazuzu
Cannot target geo mask : (Sea)
The caster unleashes an infernal tempest from the realm of Pazuzu upon a province. The storm is anything but natural and Shedim, servants of Pazuzu, can be heard bellowing in the gale. The storm causes unrest and devastation upon a province.
Unrest +35, population -4%. Reported as a random event.
